demos.name: Embedded Target for TI C2000 (tm) DSP
demos.description: Embedded Target for the Texas Instruments TMS320C2000(tm) DSP Platform integrates Simulink and MATLAB with Texas Instruments eXpressDSP(tm) tools. The software suite lets you develop and validate digital signal processing and control designs from concept through code and automates rapid prototyping. The build process creates a Code Composer Studio project from the C code generated by Real-Time Workshop. All the features provided by Code Composer Studio, such as tools for editing, building, debugging, code profiling, and project management, work to help you develop applications using MATLAB, Simulink, Real-Time Workshop, and your hardware. Optionally, the Code Composer Studio project is automatically compiled and linked, and the executable is loaded onto to your board, and run on the C2000 DSP.
